des: "I got this recipe from my aunt who is a wonderful cook.  My husband won't eat spaghetti at restaurants anymore, he says mine is better.  Home canned tomatoes are best, but stewed will work."
ins: In a large saucepan over medium heat, cook ground beef with onion until brown; drain.  Stir tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, garlic powder, oregano and mushrooms into beef mixture.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer one hour.  Serve over hot pasta.
